#summary Golf Markup Language Reference: complexType Tees.
#sidebar TOCSchema

== Name ==

[CTees Tees]
===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Tees (restriction)
}}}
    
----
  	
===  Documentation ===

        
			Set of tees from which a golf course can be played.
		
----
      
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
----
  	
===  Model ===

	<...  `colour`=xs:string  `date-from`=xs:date  `date-to`=xs:date  `gender`=golfml:GolfingGender  `name`=xs:string>
            ( uid`*`, qualification, tee{1,18}, version`*`, summary?   )
  </...>
----
  		      
=== Attributes ===

|| *Name* || *Description* || *Type* || *Use* || *Default* || *Fixed* || *Form* ||
|| colour ||  				Color of tee set.			 || xs:string || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||
|| date-from ||  				Start date of validity of tee set.			 || xs:date || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||
|| date-to ||  				End date of validity of tee set.			 || xs:date || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||
|| gender ||  				"Gender" of tee set for handicaping purpose.			 || golfml:GolfingGender || required ||  ||  || unqualified ||
|| name ||  Name of the tee set || xs:string || required ||  ||  || unqualified ||

=== Nested Elements ===

|| *Name* || *Description* || *Type* ||
|| qualification ||  					Qualification of the hole for handicaping purposes.				 || golfml:HoleQualification ||
|| summary ||  A set of statistical data associated with the set of tees || golfml:Statistics ||
|| tee ||  Description of a single hole || golfml:Tee ||
|| uid ||  					Unique identifier for an application.				 || golfml:UID ||
|| version ||  					Records tee set modifications over time.				 || golfml:Version ||

----
  		
===  Local Usage ===
    	[CGolfCourse GolfCourse]
